metadata.Title: CVE-2018-11206 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium
metadata.Description:
An out of bounds read was discovered in H5O_fill_new_decode andH5O_fill_old_decode in H5Ofill.c in the HDF HDF5 1.10.2 library. It couldallow a remote denial of service or information disclosure attack.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-11206` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

hdf5-helpers - 1.10.4+repack-11ubuntu1
hdf5-tools - 1.10.4+repack-11ubuntu1
libhdf5-103 - 1.10.4+repack-11ubuntu1
libhdf5-cpp-103 - 1.10.4+repack-11ubuntu1
libhdf5-java - 1.10.4+repack-11ubuntu1
libhdf5-jni - 1.10.4+repack-11ubuntu1
libhdf5-mpich-103 - 1.10.4+repack-11ubuntu1
libhdf5-openmpi-103 - 1.10.4+repack-11ubuntu1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: hdf5 package in esm-apps/focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.10.4+repack-11ubuntu1').
